org.apache.juneau.reflect

Class AnnotationInfo<T extends Annotation>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.reflect.AnnotationInfo<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The annotation type.

    public class AnnotationInfo<T extends Annotation>
extends Object
    Represents an annotation instance on a class and the class it was found on.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

      • getConfigApply

        public ConfigApply<Annotation> getConfigApply(VarResolverSession vrs)
                                       throws ExecutableException
        If this annotation has a PropertyStoreApply annotation, returns an instance of the specified ConfigApply class.
        Parameters:
        vrs - Variable resolver passed to the ConfigApply object.
        Returns:
        A new ConfigApply object. Never null.
        Throws:
        ExecutableException - Exception occurred on invoked constructor/method/field.

      • getClassInfo

        public ClassInfo getClassInfo()
        Returns the class that this annotation was found on.
        Returns:
        The class that this annotation was found on, or null if it was found on a package.
